dineroMarket.borrowTableHeaderBorrowingTip: The current amount of DNR you are borrowing being borrowed
dineroMarket.borrowTableHeaderInterestCostTip:
The annual cost of a loan to a borrower,
expressed as a percentage
dineroMarket.borrowTableHeaderLiquidationTip:
A penalty fee charged to a borrower when his/her position is liquidated.
It is expressed as a percentage of the loan
